OCD.name: H2 DB Filter
OCD.description: A wire component that provides filtering and aggregation for Wire Records stored by the H2DbWireRecordStores.

AD.name: sql.view
AD.description: SQL to be executed to build a view

AD.name: cache.expiration.interval
AD.description: This value specifies the cache validity in seconds. When cache expires, it will cause a new read in the database. A database read will be performed for every trigger received if the value is set to 0.

AD.name: H2DbService Target Filter
AD.description: Specifies, as an OSGi target filter, the pid of the of the H2 database instance to be used.

AD.name: emit.on.empty.result
AD.description: Defines the behaviour of the component if the result of the performed query is empty. If set to true, an empty envelope will be emitted in this case, if set to false no envelopes will be emitted.
